title: fMRIPost-template: a robust postprocessing pipeline for functional MRI
description: fMRIPost-template is a robust and easy-to-use pipeline for post-processing preprocessed fMRI data organized in BIDS format.

contributors.affiliation: Lausanne University Hospital and University of Lausanne, Lausanne, Switzerland
contributors.name: Esteban, Oscar

creators.affiliation: Department of Psychology, Florida International University
